17#include <sys/types.h>
18
19#include <stdlib.h>
20#include <string.h>
21
22#include "compat.h"
23
24void
25freezero(void *ptr, size_t size)
26{
27 if (ptr != NULL) {
28 memset(ptr, 0, size);
29 free(ptr);
30 }
31}
32
